name: prius_chaser
text: My band teacher was like that, but without the turkey.

name: chaesar
text: May band teacher was like that, only instead of turkey or brandy or handguns it was young girls in the band.

name: chaesar
text: A comment left by chaesar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotnrrd, keithcozz, endstate, STUART)

name: gumfish
text: A comment left by gumfish was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, riotdejaneiro, Unfun, Overmedicated, snowman, Vondicus, fell, jfenserty, equinn2006, jollysaintpete, Johnnyrocker, milkpants, Kennisiou, thegrumpysnail, adonkon, mediumrare, RBisme, logic, angelaw6745, gardenhead_, Direhaggis, seren_tremio, clintisiceman, Madoushi, Panserbjorne, Rakadin, Quartzblade, Pigs)

name: jdhenry105
text: Nice.

name: endoftheworld
text: Yeah, I had one of those. Band Teacher got fired for giving the drum major "love-bites"

name: contrasoma
text:
"My OLD MAN's a band teacher, you son of a bitch!"

...No, seriously.

name: history
text: ...and is your mom significantly younger than your old man?

name: belgand
text: All I know is he had a thing for field-hockey players...

name: snowman
text: Everyone was so...QUIET about it...

name: tslothrop
text: ....and they were so quiet about it.

name: ceokasen
text: ...Which keeps implying to me that he fired one into his skull.

name: closefriend
text: Ray was right to eat the turkey himself. It just makes more sense for one man to be fully satisfied than for his army to be still hungry after Ted and Barry each eat all of it.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: they couldn't each do that, you realize.

name: soticoto
text: There is plenty of meat outside for the others anyway, assuming one doesn't object to cannibalism.

name: rizzle
text: Didn't this happen in the toilet on Christmas eve.... twice?

name: sargasm
text: Ray cares about children so much he will have another spork of Christian Brothers for them.

name: saint
text: I'm not familiar with the measurement of "spork." I was Of the belief that was just a prison-style eating apparatus.

name: lacrimus
text: I show this to my music major friends, and whisper "This, this'll be you."

name: junko
text: Look at the level in the bottle - thats a damn lot of sporkfulls.

name: jollysaintpete
text: that's what i was thinking at first, but in the drawing the bottle is actually much smaller than what i sort of imagined when in comparison with the spork. the spork actually looks like a bigger drink than a bottle cap of it would be

name: dasilodavi
text:
I love the alt text. I would've wondered about Cody if not for it.
"Off camera, Cody Travis outlines his new album, 'In Christ Our Fight is Won.'"
And of course, it wasn't on a giant post-it, which is a pet peeve of mine.

name: cailetshadow
text: Chrisian always win fights in Christ that they lose in real life. It's sort of a hobby.

name: cailetshadow
text:
time to clean the keyboard.

"Christians always win fights"

name: salo
text: I hate cleaning my keyboard, but when the letters fall between the cracks there's just nothing else to do.

name: cousinted
text:
We're just two lost souls
swimming in a fish bowl,
year after year,
running over the same old ground.
What have we found?
The same old fears,
wish you were here.

name: paco
text: I love that song, but I have to wonder . . . why did you post it here?

name: riazm
text: I could imagine it playing in the GOF movie, as Ray loses confidence and we see the sun set on another day at the acres.

name: the_voice
text: None of my friends know that I fugue.

name: drago25
text:
When I take another spork of whiskey,
I always do it for the children.
Then I get all teary-eyed and salute the flag.

name: shineboxx
text: Panel 6 gets my vote for best panel ever in the history of panels.

name: talbain
text: Is it just me or does Ray gain twenty to thirty-five pounds bent over?

name: rumblefish
text:
Ray's usual physique is maintained through careful posture and the tensing of certain otherwise underused muscles. Falling slowly into unconsciousness prevents him from maintaining the sort of control necessary to perpetuate Faux Ray and allows True Ray to be revealed in all his glory.
I know this because I have sex with my shirt on.

name: poodlelucy
text:
I am a band teacher.

Is this what my retirement will bring????

name: i_love_kate
text:
Yes. Inevitably.

Inevitably.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: how does it feel, to see yourself dead?

name: saint
text:
...and as...

a cat?!

name: carlyle
text: There are so few people in life that are really that much of your dog to--no, *for* you.

name: dybrar
text: "To get some nutrition goin' on (here)" is a nice little turn of phrase.
